website_summaries.verdict: The advantages of this product include the comfortable shape and the affordability.
pros: Design allows for a good grip when scooping and slicing
Plastic edge cuts through the avocado skin nicely
It works well and comes at a good price
cons: Getting the pit out with this model can be a little trickier than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Nifty tool!
customer_reviews.text: We eat a lot of avocados in our house. Usually at least 1-2 a day. So I already had my avocado slicing, pitting, and scooping pretty much down to a science, and I was skeptical that this tool would make my life any easier. I was wrong. It literally slices through the avocado skin SO easily, and the pitter is super simple to use without any mess. The scooper works really well, but is maybe not as clean as doing a dice and scoop, which will still be my go to for certain instances, like a mixed salad. Overall, I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tool for any avocado lover!
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the coolest kitchen tool ever. Slicing an avocado can be a total pain in the butt. Pitting one is even worse, especially when its not quite ripe enough. In comes this tool. The product pictures don't accurately portray the pitter. See my picture to understand the pitting tool a little better. It literally grabs it so you can just pull it out. The gap on the other side makes it so you can pop it off without worrying about cutting your finger. The slicer works perfectly, I will need some practice for scooping but it still works pretty smoothly. My mother-in-law took one look at mine and ordered one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: Morghan Reid

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve become an avid avocado eater, but have an aversion to hitting toward my hand with a knife to get a grip on the seed. They are so easy to cut, so I figured that part would work. It did. The seed removal worked, too! Much safer and no worries. Slicing - well, that pretty much depends on ripeness. I’ve had just perfect slices, and I’ve had some that came out leaving nothing in the Shell - but better spreadable than sliceable. Holding up good so far, with a quite reasonable cost. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: D G B

customer_reviews.title: I was actually pretty impressed. Even through I wanted to try something ...
customer_reviews.text: We are big guacamole fans in my house and I thought it was time to see if I could save some time when making big batches, which is the only way to make it. I was actually pretty impressed. Even through I wanted to try something new I was still a bit skeptical and a little stuck in my ways. This slicer though changed my mind quickly. Easy to use once you get the knack of getting the pit out and leaves you with half the mess. Fabulous little tool!
customer_reviews.author: BrandyP65

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for avocados
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my baby LOVES avocados. This tool makes it easy to prepare while only dirtying one utensil. One end has a serrated edge to cut the skin, the other end has a pit remover, and the part with the slats scoops out the flesh. I will say, I wasn't able to get slices like I imagined I would, but I just mash it for the baby so it didn't really matter. And perhaps my avocado wasn't perfectly ripe or it would've worked better. But all in all, it did exactly what I needed it to do. And best part- you can throw it in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Handy little tool
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these tools were a little ridiculous, and then I lived in California for a bit and became adamant about buying one. It's a little messy to use at first since, but I think that's a matter of practice. Still not 100% about how to use the pit function but here's how I do it: smack dat pit *hard* with the teeth pointing down, then twist the pit out. You can push the pit out through the opposite side of the teeth. The biggest bummer is that the "comb" side is hard to clean out when hand washing. Otherwise a very handy little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Solution looking for a problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different brands of these that I thought might be helpful to others in our house. Well, if you have no dexterity and cannot handle a knife at all, I guess they are OK. I can open and slice up an avocado safely about 5 times faster than using this. Having said that, another family member who works on hand injuries said slicing avocados has become a major cause of hand injuries -- sometimes serious ones. So if you are a klutz ... or using sharp knives make you nervous, it might be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Critic

customer_reviews.title: I hate clutter in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is such a neat little gadget! I hate clutter in the kitchen, but totally worth another tool. I was surprised how easily the cutting edge sliced the avocado, I really didn't think it would do it since it's just plastic! I like that it gets your avocado slices nice & thin (they stay better in my sandwich that way!). Super easy to use; my only issue was with the part that's supposed to get the pit out. It didn't really work that great for me, but then again, I always have issues getting the pit out. My husband did it first try.
customer_reviews.author: Jess P

customer_reviews.title: I find that the slicer part works best on riper avocados
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and my aunt who cut her hand making guacamole - no more knife-related injuries thanks to this product! ;) But seriously, this tool is so slick for opening the avocado and taking out the pit. I find that the slicer part works best on riper avocados; I have a little more difficulty with the slicer when the avocado is more fresh. Otherwise, wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kaits

customer_reviews.title: Avocado Awesomeness!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little tool makes short work of any avocado. No sharp edges, or points that you could cut yourself with. This tool is so handy that my 5 yr. old could even use it. The de-pitting tool makes pit removal super easy. I would highly recommend this tool for anyone that loves avocado's or guacamole.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Metal ones work better...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to like this. I really did! But after several tries I'm back to using a knife and a tablespoon. I bought this after seeing what quick work an avocado slicer does at the restaurant CoreLife. But this one just kind of mushes up my avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in NY

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this tool, seeing as I've never felt the need for one before. BUT, we eat so many avocados I figured it was worth trying. So glad I did! I was surprised at how easily the plastic 'blade' sliced open the avocado. And the pitter and scooper tools worked just as well. I would definitely recommend this product to an avocado lover like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Manara

customer_reviews.title: Nice little invention
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. Easy to clean and durable. Removes the pit and is easy for me to loosen the pit too. Just a little challenging, but will get better with practice.
customer_reviews.author: nannalynn

customer_reviews.title: No more avocado related injuries!!
customer_reviews.text: As a millennial I am morally obligated to love all things avocado and this little tool is saved me from another avocado related injury. This tool is nice and sturdy and if it prevents me from cutting myself I would call this a win.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but with one downfall.
customer_reviews.text: Have alot of grip issues due to illiness, so cutting something like an avocado is extremely difficult. This tool is easy to use, makes eating one of my favorite foods alot more enjoyable. Only downfall is the pit remover doesn't really work well but still worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GodMom

customer_reviews.title: One of those things you don't think you need until you use it...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this and I thought it silly--how hard is it, really, to slice, pit, and and mash an avocado? I stand corrected. What a handy little tool...safer, too! Good quality and even nicely packaged. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha_Oe

customer_reviews.title: Bummed it doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I'm bummed, doesn't work at all as well as I thought it would. I had been using a plastic knife at work to open and slice my avocados and unfortunately that works better than this tool. The slicer just mashes the avocado. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TOOL
customer_reviews.text: This tool works so good. I have almost cut holes in my hand by trying to use a knife to stab the pit out OR use a spoon and lose half of my avocado! I love this thing. I will be buying more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: This is great quality as the vremi products seem to always be
customer_reviews.text: This is a tool I have always wanted to own. It makes utilizing an avocado MUCH easier. I would def buy others and i plan to get more to give as gifts. This is great quality as the vremi products seem to always be!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M Prudhomme

customer_reviews.title: I really love how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: This device is worth the money simply because of the thing that takes the pit out. I really love how easy it is to use, other avacado slicers I've tried require you to have so much strength but this thing does all the work for you. Avocado is one of the only things my 7 month old wants to eat and this product made it so much easier for me to quickly get him some yummy avocado.
customer_reviews.author: WriteMom

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless piece of someone's imagination. It is supposed to do everything a knife and a spoon can do much easier, cleaner and with all sizes. Mine found its place in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work okay at first. The slicer gets pretty messy though. I've only used it a few times and the pitter part of the tool bent out of shape. I wouldn't buy this specific one again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I love this 3 way avocado slicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this 3 way avocado slicer. It slices the avocado well in half and slices the avocado easily piece by piece. It is easy to hold and handle. Great to have for avocado lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C.

customer_reviews.title: This 3 in 1 worked pretty well for me
customer_reviews.text: This 3 in 1 worked pretty well for me. The cutter works very well. I had trouble with the pitter and slicer, possibly because my avocado was softer than I wanted. The pit came right out with just a push from the pitter, but the slicer didn't yield slices. It just sort of scooped out the avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gerald

customer_reviews.title: left with mushy disformed avacado, not clean slices
customer_reviews.text: Good in theory, but the plastic slicing component is way too thick to cleanly cut the avacado, so you end up going halfway to guacamole instead of neat and clean avacado slices.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I eat an avacodo every morning for breakfast and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I eat an avacodo every morning for breakfast and the thing I have he hardest time with is getting the pit out. This worked perfectly. It pulled it out with no mess, and the sharp edge cuts right through the avacodo.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: My husband and kids love avocados! I am new to the realm and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and kids love avocados! I am new to the realm and wanted a tool that easily did all the actions I needed without slicing my palm open. This was easy to use, easy to clean and kind of fun, haha! I defiantly recommend. I only struggled with the pit but once I used it to pry more than scoop it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My long time avocado slicer broke. I am very happy with my new purchase. Very easy to use & gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed 4 Life

customer_reviews.title: Great avocado slicer!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool for slicing an avocado! The slices are the same uniform size. It will definitely be used quite often in our travel trailer on our every other week camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Avocado lovers!!
customer_reviews.text: Neat little tool!! If you use avocados often this is a great tool to have!! The one edge slices through the skin and the other edge scoops out the avocado. The handlenhas a great tool to extract the seed. Easy to clean and durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bkjmom3

customer_reviews.title: Vremi ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love our Vremi slicer. Works like a charm. Slices the pit out than continues to slice the avocado. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would come 3, only reason I ordered this one for its price, pretty expensive. Not worth at all. Cheap made and doesn’t work as efficiently as the one I got from Whole Foods and still same price. Regret!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Prime Family

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat 3 in one tool
customer_reviews.text: This product worked alright. Once i figured out how to use it. I wish it came with instructions. I really like how it can scoop slice and get the pit out all with one tool. Pretty neat product
customer_reviews.author: Brasen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me. Can't get the pit out ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Can't get the pit out. You need a perfectly ripe avocado for this to work. If it's too ripe, you'll get mushy slices. If it's not fully ripe, its not strong enough to cut it
customer_reviews.author: Aanchal Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little thing!
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little tool! Makes peeling, pitting, and slicing squishy messy avocados much easier and cleaner. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Twall

customer_reviews.title: Love using this
customer_reviews.text: Love using this. I wasn't sure it would cut thru the skin, but it went through with ease! Love how it slices as you scoop out the avacado.
customer_reviews.author: jenz1028

customer_reviews.title: No easier than a knife
customer_reviews.text: Didn't find this to be all that helpful of a tool. Just as easy, if not easier to use a knife. I especially found the 'slicing' function to be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Might save you from getting a cut with a knife. But nothing great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife but she still liked using a knife better. If your not a total retard with a knife using this will not much better.
customer_reviews.author: Hooray for Boobies

customer_reviews.title: Not effective enough
customer_reviews.text: Either I do not know how to use it or is not effective enough. Used multiple times but never able to get desired results.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Takes the avocado down with ease compared to a knife ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes the avocado down with ease compared to a knife. I wish that I would have had this tool years ago! Saves me so much time cutting and peeling the avocado.
customer_reviews.author: d Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for plucking pits!
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool, especially for safely removing the pit. Wish more detailed instructions were provided. Had to go online to find out how to use the darn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. Hicks, Ed.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! So happy makes it so much easier to getting the pit out and nice slices.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Mathews

customer_reviews.title: This is the most useless item. I may be using it wrong but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useless item. I may be using it wrong but this is not sharp enough to cut into the avocado to effectively slice it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome avocado slicer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome avocado slicer! Does exactly what I need it to do since I eat avocados everyday ! I love that it pits and slices it perfectly !
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I only got this this afternoon, but I tried it....I like it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible tool. The plastic “slicers” are too wide to effectively slice the avocado. Even if it’s perfectly ripe, it will turn the fruit to mush. Look for a tool with metal or wire slicers.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy O'Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Inear avacados all the time and use 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Inear avacados all the time and use 3 different utensils now I only have to use one! The vremi slices in nice little slices also. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: It scoops the avocado up in a mush when you ...
customer_reviews.text: It scoops the avocado up in a mush when you try to get it out of it's skin.. it doesn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: None of your business

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for Avocado's
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, the item came without any instructions. I could figure out how to remove the pit and cut around the avocado and those functions work great! But every time I've sliced; from which ever side and degree of ripeness, it just shreds and falls apart! I am sure that if I had some kind of direction about how to properly slice it might make a difference. So, I use the first two functions and then slice as usual with a paring knife. Since posting my review the sellers contacted me with very specific instructions for use of this tool. I'm pleased with quality customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Montour

customer_reviews.title: I'm a huge avocado fan and like my slices to look neat
customer_reviews.text: Amazon customer service was kind enough to refund me my money, I'm a huge avocado fan and like my slices to look neat. This tool doesn't cut the slices well, the pitter doesn't work well either. Not worth it even for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: If you need a gizmo
customer_reviews.text: The cutting edge works well, but not any better than a pairing knife. The pit remover is okay, but not any better than a spoon. The slicer is useless unless the avocado is really ripe. Again, if you need a gizmo, this may be for you, but I'll stick with a pairing knife and a spoon which work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: CougFanInTX

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It cuts around the fruit very well. The only problem I had was when you scoop it out. I don't think the plastic blades are sharp enough to cut through. Mine was about perfectly ripe and it basically just smooshed it into a big mush rather than cut into nice strips.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great to have!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this tool is an all in one- peeler, slicer, and easily removes the pit. I had to experiment a bit when I received it because it does not come with any instructions, but I did figure it out and it did work well. Prior to this tool, I felt like I wasted a lot of the avocado that I could not scoop out, but not any more. This made of a heavy plastic and is great addition to my kitchen tools. Another great Vremi product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Does 2 out of its 3 functions
customer_reviews.text: The part where you cut the avocado open and the pit removal works great. The slicing part does not work for me. It just mushed the slices as you cut through. I have used this tool 5 times now and it did it every time. So now I have a tool that does 2/3 of its function. Still need to use a knife and spoon to cut the slices and remove them. Not sure it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner "scared" of avocados!
customer_reviews.text: I've never eaten an avocado before (outside of guacamole, of course!) but I just started a diet that severely limits what I can eat - and one of those things is half an avocado for dinner. So it was time to give it a try. Avocados intimidate me because of the pit - I wasn't sure I would be able to cleanly open one without smooshing everything around. I got this Slicer and Pitter tool to help this neophyte along and I'm happy to say that it made the process easy and painless! (I included a photo to prove that I didn't ruin it!) It's also great that it's dishwasher safe - I wasn't expecting that!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: super hard, super mushy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. At first I thought it was user error but I tried it with ripe avocados, medium, super hard, super mushy.. you name it! It never worked. Just sliced the avocado into one big mush ball. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: easy to slice avocado
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, easy to slice avocado, but after a few uses, the pitter tool no longer was able to effectively remove the pit. It did not seem to "grip" the seed so ended up using another tool to get this out. I have tried another 3 in 1 slicer/pitter and ran into the same problem. Must be a difficult product design
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Cut, core and process in a jiffy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and inexpensive little tool that solves a rather common problem. With one tool you will be able to slice the avocado in half, remove the seed, and scope out the contents while slicing it into six or seven equal parts. Makes processing the avocado simple and clean. Enjoy. You will not find a better solution for less anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Fine except for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This works fine except for cleaning. It's difficult getting between those slices parts to clean it properly. I'll try one of the wire one next time, but a knife and spoon work great too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Clary

customer_reviews.title: If you're making guacamole this thing's for you
customer_reviews.text: Rather I don't know how to cut up an avocado with one of these things or my avocado was just too ripe. maybe you have to have an unripe avocado to where it's hard to get it to cut with these things. I just smashed everything into a pile of goo.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Whatcott

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and an incredible time saver for your guacamole prep!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It works exactly as advertised (it is helpful to watch the video first), My prep time for making guacamole is now greatly reduced, and I am enjoying recommending this handy tool to friends. Very easy to clean - either by hand or in the dishwasher - and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: doesnt really work to cut into the slices like i wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: doesnt really work to cut into the slices like i wanted it for. the part to remove the seed works ok and it scraps all the avocado out, just not in slices at all. i tried different avocado ripeness....didn't make a difference, dislike
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Keith

customer_reviews.title: Take Avocontrol
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget! Vremi's packaging is the best. It's always fun to read the witty packaging. At first glance, I didn't think this would be all that helpful- but I was wrong! It slices through the avocado with ease. Removing the pit is now a breeze. It can be thrown straight into the dishwasher after. A clever tool!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: I was quite impressed with this product and I used ...
customer_reviews.text: I was quite impressed with this product and I used it during a demo of making guacamole during a Hispanic Month event for my company. Everyone was impressed with this gadget. maybe I should tell them where I purchased it...
customer_reviews.author: Stanley S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: My “giftees”  love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a gift, from what I’m told recipients couldn’t be happier. Big avocado eaters, they use it almost daily and from what they tell me it’s changed their lives. I’m just sayin’...
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Cutting Avocado
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to cut into avocados! I no longer have to worry about my knife slipping while cutting avocados. This is a great method for cutting the seed out of avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: It slices the avocado open very easily and the scoop/slicer part works excellent to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Eating an avocado just about every day, I thought this would be a handy tool to have. I was right. It slices the avocado open very easily and the scoop/slicer part works excellent to get it all out. The only downfall is I can't seem to get the pitter to work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jukes06

customer_reviews.title: Make removing the pit easy.
customer_reviews.text: Works great forvcuting the avocado open and removing the pit. I don’t have success with scoping out the flesh. I still love it and use every time just scop out with a spoon
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: This tool is awesome, especially if you are an avocado lover
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome, especially if you are an avocado lover. You can cut, take the seed out, and slice it all in one tool. It's plastic so you will not cut yourself trying to slice the avocado. Easy to store and clean. Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: At our house we eat a lot of avocados and I despise cutting, pitting and scraping them out. It always seems to be a mess. Since we have received this tool it has made it a lot easier! Even my kids like to use it to help out. The pitter is the best part of this tool no more worrying about getting cut when using a knife. The slicer makes it easy to put on sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks1313

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This worked great. I loved that I didn't have to pull out multiple tools to open, remove the seed, and scoop out the avocado. I normally don't buy avocados because it is not easy to get to the end product. I will be buying more now!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Knipper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! I does a fantastic job. I've never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pausing

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy tool. I used it on an extremely ripe avocado and it still cut it into nice slices. Easy to use. Easy to clean. I'm excited to continue to use it! Was able to slice the entire avocado at once and not leave any pieces behind (even with a soft avocado).
customer_reviews.author: Marshal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cut open an remove of the pit works well. Slicing not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Zodd

customer_reviews.title: Well......
customer_reviews.text: Well... It is easier to use a regular knife. Delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to peal & slice with this
customer_reviews.text: Avacadoes are my go to food! So easy to peal & slice with this. Removes the pit without messing up avacado. A definate plus to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J A W

customer_reviews.title: Think a medal one would of worked better. Totally mushed up my avocado
customer_reviews.text: didnt work at all. Just threw it away. Think a medal one would of worked better. Totally mushed up my avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, useless to remove the pit, useless to cut the flesh.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKED GREAT. JUST DON'T USE ON OVER RIPPED AVOCADO'S
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKED GREAT. JUST DON'T USE ON OVER RIPPED AVOCADO'S
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE OWEN

customer_reviews.title: 5 star yes...
customer_reviews.text: This tool takes all the work out of avocados, as i am reliably informed by my avocado hating daughter
customer_reviews.author: Austin Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well as a cutter and pitter, but...
customer_reviews.text: Not sharp enough to scoop out the flesh without making a mess. It is easier with a spoon to scoop out the flesh.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Cutter works well on the avocado and hard to cut myself. Nut remover tool works well, too. Don't use the scooper because we eat ours whole. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: This gadget has made my guacamole making self so happy! From slicing
customer_reviews.text: This gadget has made my guacamole making self so happy! From slicing, to 'de-pitting', etc! I could go on and on! Taking the pit from the avocado use to be the biggest pain but not with this tool! 100% 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not work it even for the price
customer_reviews.text: The portion that is supposed to take the pit out does not work well and the slicer portion to section does not work well. if it wasnt so cheap i wld have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: MYESHA

product_meta.title: Vremi 3 in 1 Avocado Slicer and Pitter Tool - Avocado Peeler Cutter Masher and Skinner for Kitchen to Slice and Scoop Avocados - Stainless Steel Pitter - Avocado Kitchen Tool Utensil - Green
product_meta.description:
Are you ready to guac? Then say hola to the Vremi Señor Smash Avocado Tool! This 3 in 1 tool will wrestle and wrangle your avocados into a prime position for snacking. That’s when you’re tagged in to eat and enjoy. Ready for la lucha? Here’s how to take avocontrol. 

Step Uno:
Circle the avocado with its sharp, easy-to-control plastic edge to slice in half.

Step Dos:
Remove the avocado pit with the grace of an eagle by using the stainless steel pitter located at the end of the handle.

Step Tres:
Scoop and slice the goods with the slotted comb.

When It’s All Over:
Clean up for the next match by tossing Señor Smash in the dishwasher (top rack only).

Señor Smash Avocado Tool Specs:

 * Length: 6.5 inches
 * Width: 3.1 inches
 * Stainless steel pitter
 * BPA free food-grade plastic body
feature_bullets: 3 IN 1 TOOL - This versatile avocado tool does the work of three as it efficiently cuts, pits, and slices avocados to save you time and cut down on kitchen utensil use
HEAVY DUTY CUTTER - First, cut through tough avocado skin with a sharp edge that’s safe to use and easy to control
PRACTICAL PITTER - Then, grip and remove the avocado pit with the stainless steel metal pitter located on the end of the handle
SUPER SLICER - Lastly, use the slotted comb to slice and scoop your fresh avocado to enjoy in whole pieces, or use it as a masher for a smoother consistency
DISHWASHER SAFE - This 3 in 1 avocado slicer replaces unwieldy knives with a safe alternative cutter - use top rack of dishwasher for cleaning to maintain quality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars123 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
